DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this retrospective study is to analyze if nighttime antimuscarincs may be more effective in treating patients with nocturia.
DOC.brief_title: Antimuscarinic Treatment for Female Patients With Overactive Bladder Syndrome: Comparison of Daytime and Nighttime Dosing
DOC.criteria: patients who underwent tolterodine SR treatment once per day for 12 weeks in Department of Obstetrics & Gynecology in National Taiwan University Hospital and Far Eastern Memorial Hospital
